House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00100
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REPEALING ARTICLE 247 OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE
ABSTRACT : Repeals the law that absolves the killer, affording him or her protection via the imposition of destierro.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DE JESUS, EMMI A., BROSAS, ARLENE D.
